channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Samsung fans can now get a great half-price electricity deal with British Gas – here's how it works
item.description: The Samsung Weekend Saver Fix tariff looks a tempting deal indeed – here's how to tell if you're eligible.

item.title: Cisco acquires translation startup EzDubs
item.description: Cisco has acquired Y-Combinator-backed translation app EzDub to integrate it into its communication suite.

item.title: How Blue Origin’s New Glenn rocket booster landing impacts the commercial spaceflight market
item.description: It represents real competition for SpaceX and provides more launch options for NASA, the government, and other commercial customers. Blue Origin’s New Glenn rocket successfully made its way to orbit for the second time on Nov. 13, 2025. Although the second launch is never as flashy as the first, this mission is still significant in several ways.

item.title: Belkin rappelle un accessoire pour iPhone et des batteries externes : risques sérieux d’incendie
item.description: Belkin organise un rappel pour plusieurs de ses accessoires : un socle rotatif pour iPhone et deux batteries externes pour smartphones. Les batteries de ces appareils peuvent surchauffer et causer de sérieux dommages.

item.title: Our Favorite Compact Soundbar Is $100 Off
item.description: This slim bar can slide under any TV, and has a surprisingly rich feature set for the price.

item.title: That Massive ‘Now You See Me 3’ Spoiler Cameo Almost Didn’t Happen
item.description: Director Ruben Fleischer spoke about one of the film's biggest twists and how it came together.

item.title: Peter Thiel Is Reportedly Dumping Nvidia Stock Amid AI Bubble Jitters
item.description: Are investors turning their backs on Nvidia?

item.title: What’s the Best Hair Straightener for You? It Depends (2025)
item.description: Our team tested 30 hair straighteners, from luxe brands like GHD and Dyson to inexpensive models like Conair, to help you find your hair’s perfect match.

item.title: Neo robot sounds like the answer to our home chore prayers...but also a potential privacy nightmare
item.description: We surveyed nearly half a million of our WhatsApp followers about the X1 Neo robot and potential privacy concerns. Here's what we learned and why, perhaps, these worries are overblown.

item.title: Amazon researchers uncover major token farming malware scam - over 150,000 malicious packages found
item.description: Someone has been flooding npm with wormlike packages in a bid to get as many crypto tokens as they can.

item.title: The 42 Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Holiday Sale
item.description: The company that wants you to #optoutside for Black Friday is having its sale early. Gear up for next year with these great deals on packs, sleeping bags, merino wool, and more.

item.title: Luminar is fighting with its biggest customer as bankruptcy threat looms
item.description: The fight comes at a perilous time for Luminar, which is running out of cash and under SEC investigation.

item.title: How ChatGPT can help you look after your wellbeing
item.description: How AI can help make your life easier by supporting with healthy habits.

item.title: The EU just fired a shot across the bow at Shein and Temu
item.description: Both companies have carved out an enviable niche thanks to cheap customs charge carve-outs—but that era is ending. Could the era of the super cheap phone case arriving from China in a week finally be ending? Thanks to a major change to European regulations, it just might.

item.title: Ford and Amazon just redefined the used-car marketplace
item.description: Customers in LA, Seattle, and Dallas can already browse Ford’s certified preowned inventory through Amazon, with more cities coming soon. Beep, beep: Amazon is making a bigger move into the market for used vehicles. The retail giant and Ford Motor Company announced a partnership today which will mean car buyers in three major cities can shop for, finance, and purchase a certified pre-owned Ford vehicle on Amazon Autos....

item.title: VTT électrique abordable, accessoire Tesla malin, batteries durables – Récap’ Survoltés
item.description: Une nouvelle semaine débute sur les chapeaux de roues. Du VTT électrique à petit prix made in Intersport au craquage utile pour Tesla, en passant par le revers cuisant de l’industrie européenne des batteries ou encore une bonne nouvelle pour l’autonomie des voitures électriques, voici les sujets les plus consultés de la journée sur Survoltés.

item.title: The best e-reader to buy right now
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday doesn’t officially take place until Friday, November 28th; however, if you want to shop ahead of time, we’ve rounded up the best early Black Friday deals you can already get. Any ebook reader will let you cram a Beauty and the Beast-sized library’s worth of books in your pocket, but so will your phone. […]

item.title: Roku and Amazon Fire TV 4K streaming sticks have unmissable early Black Friday deals – here are the best buys
item.description: Give your TV a streaming upgrade for less

item.title: Jeff Bezos investit des milliards dans Prometheus, un projet IA qui n’est pas un chatbot
item.description: Jeff Bezos reprend un rôle opérationnel pour la première fois depuis son départ d'Amazon. Il devient co-PDG d'une nouvelle startup, Prometheus, qui se concentre sur l'« IA physique ».

item.title: Woman Pleads Guilty to Lying About Astronaut Wife Accessing Her Bank Account From Space
item.description: Astronaut Anne McClain was accused of "identity fraud" while in space.

item.title: SpaceX to Tell NASA the Moon Will Have to Wait
item.description: A leaked internal document suggests SpaceX could miss NASA’s Artemis 3 deadline by over a year.

item.title: Le pré-Black Friday fait son cinéma avec -850 € sur ce TV Philips OLED 4K Ambilight 120 Hz
item.description: Pour une expérience cinéma digne de ce nom, cet écran Philips OLED 4K 120 Hz Ambilight se retrouve à 1 147 euros au lieu de 1 999 euros.

item.title: The Apple Watch Series 11 is already getting a lowest-ever Black Friday discount
item.description: The brand new Apple Watch Series 11 is already getting a hefty $50 discount.

item.title: The largest microSD cards you can buy right now: 2TB memory cards from as little as $170
item.description: These are the largest microSD cards you can buy right now - 2TB memory cards priced as low as $170.

item.title: This Is Our Best Look at Samsung’s Galaxy Buds 4 Pro Yet
item.description: Bye-bye, angular blade design?

item.title: Beats Studio Pro over-ears are back to their lowest ever price of £149 –Black Friday's heating up nicely…
item.description: We're big fans of Beats and right now, the company's newest over-ear headphones are back down to their lowest price ever. Come on!

item.title: Hisense’s Annual Upgrade Season Is Taking Up to $2,800 Off Its Top TVs Before Black Friday, With a Free $100 FIFA Gift Card
item.description: Upgrading your entertainment setup has never been more affordable.

item.title: ‘Moana’ Comes to Life in First Live Action Trailer
item.description: Catherine Lagaʻaia and Dwayne Johnson in a live-action remake of the hit animated film.

item.title: How to watch Germany vs Slovakia: 2026 World Cup Qualifier, free streams, TV channels, preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Germany vs Slovakia live streams online and from anywhere, with both teams vying for top spot and a place at the World Cup.

item.title: Sequoia-backed fintech Aspora will let Indian diaspora pay bills back home
item.description: UK-based Aspora, which has focused on remittances, will let non-resident Indians pay bills back home.

item.title: Proton VPN reveals Black Friday sales are directly paying for server expansion
item.description: Ever wonder where your VPN subscription money goes? Proton has just confirmed its early Black Friday sales are already being funneled into expanding its server infrastructure for all users.

item.title: Trump Wants to Mine Near the Marianas Trench—Some of the Deepest Waters on Earth
item.description: Efforts to expand deep-sea mining are alarming scientists and Indigenous leaders, who worry mining risks fisheries and food security.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode can now help you visualize your travel plans
item.description: Google users can now describe their next trip to its AI Mode in search and select the option to “Create with Canvas,” which will build out an itinerary in a side panel complete with data on flights and hotels. The document it puts together can lay out potential plans, with suggestions based on the user’s […]

item.title: Netgear’s $499.99 5G hotspot lets you swap eSIMs at will
item.description: Netgear announced its latest mobile hotspot today, the Nighthawk 5G M7, which will be available in January, along with a new mobile app and an eSIM marketplace where you can purchase local SIM cards for more than 140 countries. The M7 comes unlocked for $499.99, making it a more affordable alternative to the unlocked version […]

item.title: Les nuages d’Amazon, de Microsoft et de Google sur la sellette européenne
item.description: Les opérateurs de cloud — Microsoft, Alphabet et Amazon — sont sous la loupe du régulateur européen. Bruxelles chercherait à déterminer si les mastodontes américains des services d'hébergement et de stockage en ligne peuvent tomber dans l'escarcelle du DMA.

item.title: Nintendo releases first official photos for The Legend of Zelda Movie – and they might confirm which game it's based on
item.description: The Legend of Zelda Movie's first-look images have been revealed, but I'm more interested by what that video leak shows us.

item.title: OpenAI wants ChatGPT to contribute to your group chats - and I can't decide if that's exciting or creepy
item.description: OpenAI is trialling new group chat functions with ChatGPT for some users - but do we really want this?

item.title: Need a cheap Christmas stocking filler? Apple AirTags are outrageously good value
item.description: Amazon has discounted the Apple AirTag to record-low prices ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: Black Friday Apple deals start now – record-low prices are already live on AirPods, MacBooks, Apple Watch and more
item.description: Black Friday Apple deals are live ahead of November 28, and I'm rounding up the best devices, featuring record-low prices on AirPods, MacBooks, the Apple Watch, and more.

item.title: ‘Mighty Nein’ Still Brings the Fun of ‘Critical Role’ to Animation
item.description: The 'Critical Role' team mostly succeed at bringing their breakout campaign 'The Mighty Nein' to Prime Video.

item.title: Google rolls out its AI ‘Flight Deals’ tool globally, adds new travel features in Search
item.description: To get started, users need to describe where, when, and how they want to travel. Flight Deals will then use AI to display the best bargains available.

item.title: Planning a trip? These 3 new Google AI tools could save you a lot of time and money
item.description: Google’s latest AI updates make trip planning faster and easier by combining itinerary building, deal-finding, and reservation booking into one smart system.

item.title: Boulanger fait le plein de bonnes affaires au pré-Black Friday : les 23 meilleurs deals à saisir
item.description: À l’approche du grand rendez-vous du Black Friday, Boulanger met en ligne de toutes nouvelles promotions, proposant jusqu’à 40 % de remise sur de nombreux produits Tech comme les smartphones, téléviseurs, ordinateurs portables ou équipements audio. Une belle occasion de faire de bonnes affaires avant le jour J.

item.title: As Windows Turns 40, It’s ‘Evolving’ Into a Bloated AI Slop Machine
item.description: Windows Copilot can't even tell users how to correctly resize their text.

item.title: Looking for a cheap JBL Bluetooth speaker? Some of our favorites have record-low early Black Friday deals at Amazon
item.description: Get big wireless sound for a small price before Black Friday begins – we tested all these JBL speakers, and rate them highly

item.title: Fnac et Darty lancent de nouvelles offres à l’approche du véritable Black Friday : le TOP 11 des bons plans immanquables
item.description: La frénésie du Black Friday continue chez la Fnac et Darty. Les deux enseignes mettent en ligne de nouvelles offres qui sont très intéressantes : Pixel 9 à -45 %, Galaxy S25 Edge dans un pack avec 550 euros de remise... Découvrez les offres qui méritent votre argent.

item.title: Welcome to Derry gave me the Stephen King crossover I always wanted – and one star says ‘my favorite things that I’ve done in my career are on this show’
item.description: Chris Chalk stepped into the shoes of an iconic Stephen King character for IT: Welcome to Derry and teased he had a "blast" doing it.
